lead_paragraph: The Sports of The Times column on Monday, about the legacy of Bud Selig as Major League Baseball’s commissioner and as a major backer of the World Baseball Classic, misstated the timing of the next installment of the tournament. It will be in 2013, not during the three years left on Selig’s contract as commissioner.
